description: Period of continued fraction for square root of n-th squarefree integer.
links: R. Knott, An Introduction to Continued Fractions
example: a(2)=1 because 2 is the 2nd smallest squarefree integer and sqrt 2 = [ 1,2,2,2,2,... ] thus has an eventual period of 1.
author: David L. Treumann (alewifepurswest(AT)yahoo.com)
extensions: Corrected and extended by _James A. Sellers_
